title: Problems installing the client
body: I just installed LOL on my brother's computer and it was all going normally until it was installing the patch and stopped. I received this notification "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information ".  Can anyone please help me?

replies.body: Depending on how much progress you had made in that patch, this might have been some kind of permissions error. Hit up our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for how you can set those up again if you need!
